thread.title: great location for ExCel
thread.title_full: great location for ExCel - Review of DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel London ExCel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: TouringTilly
title: great location for ExCel
text: Quick check in with very friendly staff and i was given a warm chocolate cookie which was a nice touch. Room was modern and clean with a large comfy bed, I went out for an eveing meal so can not comment on the resturant, i can say that breakfast was good, large choice and friendly staff with plenty of coffee top ups. Large que t check out but did move quickly. Nice friendly hotel.
